General.Name: Shenzhen Han's CNC Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Han's CNC Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and manufacturing of printed circuit board (PCB) products. It offers multilayer and high density inter-connected PCBs, and rigid-flex board products. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Xiaodong  Zhou
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. & Financial Controller and Board Sec.
